analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily concern the establishment and operation of interagency task forces and advisory councils. These groups are formed to address specific national issues, ranging from economic recovery after natural disasters to financial literacy and family reunification at the border. The documents outline the structure, membership, functions, and administrative aspects of these councils and task forces, emphasizing coordination between various government agencies and the importance of expert advice and recommendations.
title: Federal Interagency Groups Addressing National Challenges
